sentences.en: "Basic Instinct" catapulted her to top status among Hollywood's glamour goddesses.
sentences.cn: 《本能》使她跃至一线，成功跻身好莱坞耀眼的女明星之列。

sentences.en: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status.
sentences.cn: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。

sentences.en: He was irked by his lowly status.
sentences.cn: 他为自己地位卑微而恼恨。

sentences.en: His energy and talent elevate him to godlike status.
sentences.cn: 他因精力充沛、才华横溢而被尊为神人。

sentences.en: Nurses are undervalued, and they never enjoy the same status as doctors.
sentences.cn: 护士的作用被人们低估了，她们从未享有和医生同样的地位。

sentences.en: Please keep us informed of the status of this project.
sentences.cn: 请随时告知我们该项目的进展情况。

sentences.en: That adds up to an endorsement of the status quo.
The ads helped Nike to achieve iconic status.
sentences.cn: 这些广告帮助耐克公司成就了其偶像地位。

sentences.en: The dazzle of stardom and status attracts them.
sentences.cn: 明星的光彩和地位吸引着他们。

sentences.en: The fund was in danger of losing its tax-exempt status.
sentences.cn: 该基金面临不再享受免税待遇的风险。

sentences.en: The personal allowance depends on your age and marital status.
sentences.cn: 个人免税额的多少取决于年龄和婚姻状况。

sentences.en: The WHO recommendation has no legal status.
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织的建议不具备法律效应。

sentences.en: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.cn: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.en: They have no wish for any change in the status quo.
We must not return to the status quo.
What is your current financial status?
sentences.cn: 你目前的经济状况如何？

sentences.en: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?

trans.tran_en: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc
